Package com.skopylov.retry

Class Retry.Builder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skopylov.retry.Retry.Builder<T>
  • Enclosing interface:
    Retry
    public static class Retry.Builder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Retry builder to configure retry process with maxTries, delay, error handler, etc.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • maxTries

        public Retry.Builder<T> maxTries​(long maxTries)
        Sets max number of tries. Default - 10.

        Zero or negative value means infinite number of tries. Use forever() for this purpose.

        Parameters:
        maxTries - max number of tries
        Returns:
        Retry.Builder

      • forever

        public Retry.Builder<T> forever()
        Sets infinite number of tries.
        Returns:
        Retry.Builder

      • delay

        public Retry.Builder<T> delay​(long delay,
                              java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Sets retry delay.
        Parameters:
        delay - retry delay. Default - 1
        timeUnit - delay time unit. Default - seconds
        Returns:
        Retry.Builder

      • withErrorHandler

        public Retry.Builder<T> withErrorHandler​(Retry.ErrorHandler errorHandler)
        Sets error handler. Default - no error handler.
        Parameters:
        errorHandler -
        Returns:
        Retry.Builder builder

      • withExecutor

        public Retry.Builder<T> withExecutor​(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Sets executor for retry process.
        Parameters:
        executor - executor. Default - ForkJoinPool.commonPool()
        Returns:
        builder

      • retry

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<T> retry()

        Returns:
